full_summary:
**Business Process Consultant (Senior) - Financial Process Transformation**

**Tender Details**
===========

**Tender Reference:** PW-22-01017669
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** W0152-23-AA156
**Publication Date:** December 16, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** January 18, 2023, 14:00 EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified
**Expected Contract End Date:** Not specified

**Background**
------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking the services of a Senior Business Process Consultant to support the transformation of financial processes, including significant business process changes resulting from the implementation of SAP and its integration into the Defence Resource Management Information System (DRMIS).

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The consultant will provide expert advice and guidance to the Director, Financial Systems Integration (DFSI), Director General, Strategic Financial Governance (DGSFG), and the Governance and Project Management Office team (G&PMO) within DFSI. The consultant will also work with clients and stakeholders across DND/CAF.

**Requirements**
---------------

* Experience in financial process transformation and SAP implementation
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Ability to work effectively in a team environment
* Level of Security Requirement: Reliability

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This tender is open to firms that have signed the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

**Tendering Process**
---------------------

Firms who have signed the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Agreement with E60ZT-18TSPS (Tier 1) under the category 2.5 - Business Process Consultant (Senior) will be invited to submit a proposal. The period of the contract is expected to be from the date of contract award to February 28th, 2024, with an optional six-month period.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Contact: Wallace, Caleb
Email: [ADMFinProcurement-ApprovisionnementSMAFin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:ADMFinProcurement-ApprovisionnementSMAFin@forces.gc.ca)

[Attachment]: PDF document containing the complete tender package can be downloaded from [https
